newsArray.title: ‚ÄúA memory of a lifetime‚Äù - Rohit Sharma gifts his bat to CSK‚Äôs rising star from IPL 2025 [In Picture]
creator: Dev Sharma
newsArray.description: India‚Äôs ODI captain Rohit Sharma recently gifted a bat to young Mumbai cricketer and Chennai Super Kings (CSK) batter Ayush Mhatre. The 17-year-old turned heads in his maiden IPL season in 2025.

newsArray.title: Kapil Dev not impressed with Pataudi Trophy being renamed, says it feels strange
creator: TOI Sports Desk
newsArray.description: Kapil Dev voiced his surprise at the Pataudi Trophy's renaming to the Anderson-Tendulkar Trophy, deeming it "strange." This decision by the ECB had also drawn criticism, including from Sunil Gavaskar, especially given the Pataudi family's historical significance to India-England cricket. Despite the name change, the Pataudi legacy will be honored through a special medal given to the winning captain of the series.

newsArray.title: Sai Sudharsan OUT, Star To Return After 8 Years: India Likely Playing XI For 1st Test Vs England - Report
creator: Shaunak Ghosh
newsArray.description: India wants to field two all-rounders in their playing XI. Ravindra Jadeja is almost a certainty. They would then play one of Nitish Kumar Reddy, Shardul Thakur, and Washington Sundar. They would then have to sacrifice a frontline batter.
